targets.query: SELECT distinct("value") FROM "restingHeartRate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(null)
SELECT moving_average(mean("value"), 6) FROM "heartrate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
select above from (SELECT moving_average(mean("value"), 6) as above FROM "heartrate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)) where above > 95
select above from (SELECT moving_average(mean("value"), 6) as above FROM "heartrate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)) where above > 105
select below from (SELECT moving_average(mean("value"), 6) as below FROM "heartrate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)) where below < 60
SELECT mean("value") FROM "heartrate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
select above from (SELECT moving_average(mean("value"), 6) as above FROM "heartrate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)) where above > 95
select above from (SELECT moving_average(mean("value"), 6) as above FROM "heartrate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)) where above > 105
select below from (SELECT moving_average(mean("value"), 6) as below FROM "heartrate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)) where below < $RHR
SELECT distinct("minutes_awake") FROM "sleep" WHERE is_main_sleep = true AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("minutes_rem") FROM "sleep" WHERE is_main_sleep = true AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("minutes_light") FROM "sleep" WHERE is_main_sleep = true AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("minutes_deep") FROM "sleep" WHERE is_main_sleep = true AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sleep_type FROM sleep_levels WHERE short = false
SELECT count("greater than 250") FROM hourly_steps_sum WHERE  "greater than 250" = true AND $timeFilter
